organic.title: Find Help and Treatment for Mental Health, Drug, Alcohol Issues
organic.snippet: Find treatment locators and helplines such as the 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline, FindTreatment.gov, FindSupport.gov, and others.

organic.title: Recovery & Reentry - Cook Inlet Tribal Council
organic.snippet: Our Recovery & Reentry Services provide comprehensive treatment to assist individuals throughout all stages of recovery from substance abuse or addiction.

organic.title: Cook Inlet Tribal Council Recovery Services (CITC)
organic.snippet: Locations (4). Cook Inlet Tribal Council Child & Family Services. 3600 San Jeronimo DriveAnchorage, AK 99508US.

organic.title: Cook Inlet Tribal Council: Home
organic.snippet: Spurr has shown increased volcanic activity recently and we want to share our emergency plans to ensure you are aware of what CITC will do if an eruption occurs ...

organic.title: Ernie Turner Center - Recovery Journey Program
organic.snippet: Ernie Turner Center - Recovery Services is a Co-Occurring treatment program that provides services to adults (male and female) ages 18 years of age and up.
